scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run build-schema
scripts.build-schema: ts-json-schema-generator --no-top-ref --path src/settings/CSpellSettingsDef.ts --type CSpellSettings --validation-keywords markdownDescription  --validation-keywords scope --validation-keywords deprecationMessage -o  ./cspell.schema.json && cp ./cspell.schema.json ../..
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
